name: iTunes Preview Dark
description:
• A dark version of iTunes web-previews

• Eliminated distracting & unnecessary elements

• Designed to match Apple's updated iTunes web-preview page
additional_info:
Update 1 • Clicking on 'Version History' & the 'More' button under cut-off reviews will no longer cause the background to become white behind the pop-up text box. The background now fades to grey! • App description & user review font has been made slightly larger for better readability • App version numbers in 'Version History' are now white (instead of black text on a black background - sorry for missing that)

Update 2 • Lighter shades of blue for links to better stand out against a black background • Various tweaks to font sizes and colors for better readability

Update 3 • Big update to various elements. User reviews now have borders for better visibility. Font sizes were increased in many places as well as minor tweaks to letter spacing • App prices are now much larger and in bold to draw attention to them

Update 4 • Minor update to fix the black font color of the app description. Sorry that was broken. Apple must have changed the element name

Update 5 • Fixed the app description font color that would not turn white unless you clicked 'more' to expand the description. • Fixed font color to white when clicking 'Version History' *This style has only been successfully tested for iTunes App Store previews. Mac App Store web previews may be broken. I will update on a rolling basis as I fix these issues*
